fields.label: translate:: Comments
fields.description: translate:: The comments are shown when the user displays the suggested answers for all slides.

fields.label: translate:: Specific slide number
fields.description: translate:: Only applicable when 'Specific slide number' is selected

fields.label: translate:: Invisible
fields.description: translate:: Default cursor, no title and no tab index. Warning: Users with disabilities or keyboard only users will have trouble using this element.

fields.label: translate:: Image
fields.description: translate:: Image background should have a 2:1 width to height ratio to avoid stretching. High resolution images will display better on larger screens.

fields.label: translate:: Image
fields.description: translate:: Image background should have a 2:1 width to height ratio to avoid stretching. High resolution images will display better on larger screens.

fields.label: translate:: Title for show solutions button
translate:: Text for the retry button
translate:: Text for the export text button
translate:: Hide sidebar navigation menu button title
translate:: Show sidebar navigation menu button title
translate:: Text when multiple tasks on a page
translate:: Title for the comments icon
translate:: Print dialog ingress
fields.default: translate:: How would you like to print this presentation?

fields.label: translate:: Label for "Print all slides" button
translate:: Label for "Print current slide" button
translate:: Label for slides without a title
translate:: Explanation of slide navigation for assistive technologies
fields.default: translate:: Use left and right arrow to change slide in that direction whenever canvas is selected.

fields.label: translate:: Canvas label for assistive technologies
fields.default: translate:: Presentation canvas. Use left and right arrow to move between slides.

fields.label: translate:: Label for slide counter. Variables are @index, @total
translate:: Label for slides that only contains correct answers
translate:: Label for slides that has incorrect answers
translate:: Label for social sharing bar
translate:: Total score announcement for assistive technologies
fields.default: translate:: You got @score of @maxScore points in total

fields.label: translate:: Entered fullscreen announcement for assistive technologies
translate:: Exited fullscreen announcement for assistive technologies

semantics.label: translate:: Behaviour settings.
semantics.description: translate:: These options will let you override behaviour settings.

fields.label: translate:: Activate Active Surface Mode
fields.description: translate:: Removes navigation controls for the end user. Use Go To Slide to navigate.

fields.label: translate:: Override "Show Solution" button
fields.description: translate:: This option determines if the "Show Solution" button will be configured for each question individually (default) shown for all questions (Enabled) or disabled for all questions (Disabled)

fields.label: translate:: Override "Retry" button
fields.description: translate:: This option determines if the "Retry" button will be configured for each question individually (default) shown for all questions (Enabled) or disabled for all questions (Disabled)

fields.label: translate:: Show "Show solution" button in the summary slide
fields.description: translate:: If enabled, the learner will be able to show the solutions for all question when they reach the summary slide

fields.label: translate:: Show "Retry" button in the summary slide
fields.description: translate:: If enabled, the learner will be able to retry all questions when they reach the summary slide. Be advised that by refreshing the page the learners will be able to retry even if this button isn't showing.

fields.label: translate:: Social Settings
fields.description: translate:: These options will let you override social behaviour settings. Empty values will be filled in automatically if a link is provided, otherwise all values will be generated.

fields.label: translate:: Share to Facebook quote
fields.default: translate:: I scored @score out of @maxScore on a task at @currentpageurl.

fields.label: translate:: Share to Twitter statement
fields.default: translate:: I scored @score out of @maxScore on a task at @currentpageurl.
